sentences.en: ...men standing around, swilling beer and occasionally leering at passing females.
sentences.cn: …男人们站在周围，大口喝着啤酒，偶尔色迷迷地斜瞟着过路的女性。

sentences.en: Dainty of vicinity white bridge, over rainbow horizontal leer , no less than piles Xin Xue.
sentences.cn: 近处白桥纤巧, 虹横秋波之上, 正如一堆新雪.

sentences.en: He has a most unpleasant leer.
He looked at her with an evil leer.
sentences.cn: 他用不怀好意的目光看着她。

sentences.en: Ich liebe dich immer noch so sehr tr & auml ; nenschwer mein kopf is leer.
sentences.cn: 我仍然如此爱你我泪流满面心中空白.

sentences.en: LIZZIE: ( ironically ) With five thousand a year, would not matter if he warts and a leer.
sentences.cn: 丽齐: ( 嘲讽地 ) 每年有五千磅的收入, 谁会管他是不是满脸麻子.

sentences.en: The modified HLLEW ( Harten - Lax - van Leer - Einfeldt - Wada ) scheme is used for the solution of fluid equations.
sentences.cn: 其中流体计算的空间离散采用改进的HLLEW ( Harten—Lax -van Leer-Einfeldt-Wada ) 格式.

sentences.en: They leer, they simper at her shame: Gay.
sentences.cn: 他们斜视着这个乞丐; 他在别人的斜视中抬起了头.

words.tran_cn: 机敏的；狡猾的；猜疑的；送秋波的

trans.tran_cn: 斜瞅，睨视，横目，斜视，邪笑，媚眼，秋波，[化]退火炉

trans.tran_en: If someone leers at you, they smile in an unpleasant way, usually because they are sexually interested in you
